title: A Little Magic
description: A Hidden Stepdancer Siobhan Kelly didn't believe in magic - until the magic chose her.A Promise She's been warned magic is evil, but with her grandmother felled by a deadly curse, she must make a bargain with the local Fairie prince - the return of their sacred Jewel in exchange for her grandmother's life.And it just might work too - if only she can escape the dark witch who's made Siobhan her prey in the hunt for a deadly blood spell.
author: Valerie Gillen
